pr_title: Adds more rationale and fixes some fuzz in HTTP

timeline.message: Adds more rationale and fixes some fuzz in HTTP

timeline.bodyText: Added this section due to a chat with @jcchavezs. Basically the first thing we should focus on is that "error=true" or "error=false".. this is usually a modeling mistake. Before getting into the nuance of booleans, we should help people out of mistakes.
